entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43853
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43848
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43847
  • When trying to install dotnet-ef tool, we get error saying that dotnet-ef is not a .NET tool #43844
  • Multiple string null and empty check #43828

Closed

  • Suggestion: Add custom MSBuild targets to the command resolver, i.e. `dotnet mytarget` #8185
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Show dogfood annotation in prompt #43846
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update dev container to centos-stream9 #43845
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #43843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #43842
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43841
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Delete old crossgen conditions #43840
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Create a dotnet-new template for .gitattributes #43764
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Lock comments for Windows setup #43699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.404 #43824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.307 #43823
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.111 #43822
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature
  • Update branding to 6.0.136 #43820
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.428 #43821
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change to attempt launching browser on dotnet run - Related Issue #9038 #43615
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #43819
    Servicing-approved
  • Disable baseline manifest generation #43797
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Merge the net10 runtime, aspnetcore, windowsdesktop, and arcade codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Introduce a join point for SdkLocator and VSTemplateLocator #43723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update manpages for 9.0 #43776
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add missing conditions for illumos #43775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix port when fall back to http #43620
    untriaged, Area-Containers
